adventure_overview: Get together with your den, pack, or family to go on a bike ride . You will learn about what to take, how to make sure your bike is ready, and then go for a ride ! Grab your helmet, check your tires, and a buddy to head out on another Cub Scout Adventure. Prior to any activity, use Scouting America SAFE Checklist to ensure the safety of all those involved. All participants in official Scouting America activities should become familiar with the Guide to Safe Scouting and applicable program literature or manuals.

requirements.text: Show how to properly wear a bicycle helmet. Show you can take off and put on without help.
